feed.title: Combined summary - Video summarizations of blocksize issues?

entry.title: Combined summary - Video summarizations of blocksize issues?
entry.summary: On June 18, 2015, an individual named odinn sent an email requesting a parallel presentation of concepts and arguments from multiple sides regarding technical issues related to voting/adoption. The purpose of this request was to make it easier for those unfamiliar with development circles to understand the different perspectives on the issue and make informed decisions. Odinn also suggested presenting this information in a wiki format. The email raises the question of whether such a resource is necessary or valid.Odinn's interest in the topic may have been prompted by a YouTube video that was shared along with the email. Overall, the email suggests a desire to gain a comprehensive understanding of technical issues related to voting/adoption and to consider various viewpoints.
